prompts: Create a muscular Pokemon that excels in hand-to-hand combat with a blue and gray color scheme.
Imagine a bipedal fighting Pokemon with a determined expression and a strong physique.
Generate a character based on a martial artist, showcasing blue skin and a powerful stance.
Design a Pokemon that embodies strength and agility, featuring a prominent fist and a friendly smile.
Make a small, energetic fighting type Pokemon that looks ready to take on any challenger.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the spirit of competition, with an emphasis on training and discipline.
Give me a depiction of a determined fighter Pokemon that thrives in rocky terrains.

distinctive_features: Fist clenched in a fighting pose
